snippet.title: Zombie Teacher - New Indie Game 2017 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The demo is finally here! Give it a try and please let me know what you think. For now, Enjoy the first ever Reveal/Gameplay trailer! This is my indie project/ love letter to gaming. I'm a 1-man development team and I would love some feedback!

https://zombie-teacher.itch.io/zombie-teacher-demo

Zombie teacher is a tough as nails arcade platformer. Designed in the manic play style of super meat boy and N+ before it, Zombie Teacher is as pure as they come. I wanted to make a game that felt like a triumph when you finished it, something that not many people would be able to do. It's all about braggin' rights after all.
